error_desc: SP is appealing for Resolve Request but associate had used 'All Docs Missing' as reason code instead using 'Resolve Request/Testing refusal'
correct_resolution: Reason code should be Resolved >> Not Approved >> Resolve Request/Testing refusal

error_desc: “PA-Appeals-Document Missing” blurb was incorrectly sent but ASIN was tombstoned.
Incorrectly classified as FP. ASIN is color changing mode pencils with kids claims. ASIN is  TP as per CA arts and crafts SOP
Associate had missed to send communication in local language based Appeal language. As per SOP, if seller is communicating in local language we need to respond in the same language
“PA- Multiple re-opens for appeals” blurb was incorrectly sent but ASIN was tombstoned.
Incorrectly classified as TP. ASIN is a pet toy, as per SOP pet toys are out of scope.
Associate had missed to send communication in local language based Appeal language. As per SOP we need to respond back on same language if seller is asking something in local language
Associate had missed to send communication in local language based Appeal language. As per SOP we need to respond back on same language if seller is asking something in local language
Reason code is incorrect. ASIN is FP but the reviewer had incorrectly selected the reason code as “All document missing”
ASIN has inappropriate theme for kids.
correct_resolution: “PA Toys -  FP ASIN with TP claims” blurb

error_desc: Reviewer missed to add “Please disregard our previous communication” in the blurb.
correct_resolution: “Please disregard our previous communication”  has to be sent when corrective action is taken.

error_desc: Incorrectly sent MVP blurb. As per the update we have only 3 Brands under MVP ( LEGO, FUNKO, APPLE).
correct_resolution: FP- Please Validate Brand and Manufacturer attributes in CSI and Images in Media Central for MVPs check.

error_desc: Incorrectly Classified as FP. As Per GRC Jigsaw Puzzles are to be classified based on number of Pieces ( 499 and lesser Pieces are TP)
Incorrectly classified as TP. As per GRC Pet toys are to be considered as FP.
Case was a 2nd reopen but reviewer Incorrectly sent subsequent blurb.
Incorrect GRC name and link used. Should have used oyster for Infant Bouncer Seats but used oyster for Booster Seats and the blurb edit is also incorrect.
correct_resolution: PRC name and oyster for Infant Bouncer Seats should be sent.

error_desc: ASIN was classified incorrectly as FP. It is a robe. As per SOP, all robes should be restricted even if there are no “sleep” or “sleepwear” claim.

ASIN was classified incorrectly as FP. ASIN is a hand warmer with both input and output ports and the seller is advertising 'USB hand warmer can be used as a portable mobile power, charging your electronic devices through the USB cable.'
The case belongs to “hardlines-product-compliance-us@amazon.com” queue. Reviewer had mentioned incorrect PRC name as “Children's Sleepwear” and attached wrong oyster link
correct_resolution: Correct PRC name and Oyster link has to be sent i.e, “Non Toys Magnets”

error_desc: Incorrectly classified as TP. These are general use Pencils without any Play value or CE Marking.

Incorrectly classified as FP. ASIN is Plush toy and as mentioned in title. Plush toy should be approved only If there is strong FP claims like PA or Adult themed or Valentine claims without any kids claims.
Case belonged to CA MP, but EU blurb was sent. Please use the update Ashva tool to avoid such blurb errors.
ASIN was classified incorrectly. It is a casual wear and doesn't have any role-play value in it.
ASIN is a full body safety harness used for workers for safety purpose - associate approved the ASIN.
Communication was correct (FP) but wrong reason code was selected. Image Missing RC was selected.
